title: Garen is official broken ,worse then fiora yasou
body:
Go full lethality on ur Runes. Buy lethality items... one shot everybody with 1 q...


ty riot..

replies.body: You could do that before lol

> one shot everybody with 1 q

Can you please provide a video where we can see an actual OS with 1 Q from garen, from a ladder game ? I'm quite curious :)

> [{quoted}](name=LegenDariusGaren,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NnY49eET,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-07-13T00:11:21.501+0000)
>
> Did someone call? 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9XDLzierYZg

Passive villain+crit+Q+ some E+Items bonus+ full build+elixir + late game when all squishy die so easy in 1 or 2 seconds

Next try!

Item bonuses still fit under Q. If I had tri force, you would have been like "Sheen Proc does not count"

Q crit + Duskblade + GreenFathers + Freshblood + Deadmans + Villain passive = 1900 damage from only 3 damage items. I could have bought TriForce for the luls overkill, but I only need 3 damage items for a One Shot.

> [{quoted}](name=LegenDariusGaren,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NnY49eET,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-07-13T00:11:21.501+0000)
>
> Did someone call? 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9XDLzierYZg

this is still statisfying to watch. its an older video though.

was this before the damage proc on dead mans was nerfed?

I have seen it many times as well and it feels satisfying  every single  time.  
You can look at the date it was posted, which is December 2016. I think it was before the Lethality buffs, so that was probably before the  changes to Deadmans. 
The guys in our Garen club were wondering if you wanted to join our club with your NA account. Although it is full, we can make room probably.

> [{quoted}](name=LegenDariusGaren,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=NnY49eET,comment-id=0004000000010000,timestamp=2017-07-13T01:51:22.357+0000)
>
> I have seen it many times as well and it feels satisfying  every single  time.  
> You can look at the date it was posted, which is December 2016. I think it was before the Lethality buffs, so that was probably before the  changes to Deadmans. 
> The guys in our Garen club were wondering if you wanted to join our club with your NA account. Although it is full, we can make room probably.

tempted, but i dont know if i could contribute a lot. im practically never on that account and mostly just run it for the forum.

the only reason why was playing arams on it recently was to get past level barrier to be able to post on the dev corner. i dont know if its worth to kick another account out just to make room for mine, when im never online.
Still get kited by everyting and everyone.
Also watch as you die in 1 hit from {{champion:119}}

Plus he also gets a free silence, movespeed and can catchup to anyone. Plus built in armor and mr passive. Plus true damage from his ult on every swing.

Shame no one uses him, he's actually quite strong

His Q isn't as strong as you think. The cleanse on it is garbage to anyone that can apply a constant slow (hello anyone with Rylai's in their item set). He also has low base movement and gets dumpstered on by anyone with even a small semblance of mobility, since the Q movespeed bonus doesn't actually last that long. Out of all the Juggernauts, Garen doesn't even arguably have the worst kit, he straight up does. There's too much power shunted into a pseudo-rng mechanic for him to actually have a decent chance of going toe to toe with more mechanically challenging juggernauts like Illaoi.

Hell else is new?  They nerf the weak champs and buff the strong ones again and again, then months later they are like "Oh my, this champion is too strong in the laning phase" - yeah, you purposely caused it.  I saw the changes and I'm absolutely sickened by it - let's buff garen but nerf that evil Ivern who does next to no damage because all the professional junglers who like hogging buffs and KS'ing anything and anybody hate him for being generous.

If Garen do that then Fiora and Yasuo one shoot everybody with a autoattack.


Why you focus Garen only? All champs benefits of lethality even more...

lethality is back into play, it was going to happen, we knew it was going to happen for 4 weeks, hell we knew it was going to happen with the assassin rework AFTER they nerfed it, everything circles around in league atleast 3x every season
